data.name: Error_Not_Able_To_Connect_To_Store
data.value: Not able to connect to the App Store. Please try again later.

data.name: Error_Restore_Failed
data.value: Restore failed, please try again later.

data.name: Error_App_Store_Unavailable
data.value: The App Store seems to be currently unavailable. Please try again later.

data.name: Error_App_Store_Billing_Unavailable
data.value: Billing seems to be unavailable. Please try again later.

data.name: Error_App_Store_Payment_Invalid
data.value: App Store payment seems to be invalid. Please try again.

data.name: Error_App_Store_Payment_Not_Allowed
data.value: Payment not allowed/enabled. Please try again.

data.name: Error_Could_Not_Start_Audio
data.value: Not able to start the listening engine. Please ensure that this application is allowed to use the microphone.

data.name: Message_Advanced_Features_Subscription_Expired
data.value: Your subscription to Advanced Features has expired. Advanced Features are now disabled.

data.name: Message_Advanced_Features_Days_Remaining_Format
data.value: You have {0} day{1} remaining for your Advanced Features trial

data.name: Message_Advanced_Features_Trial_Expired
data.value: The trial of the Advanced Features has expired and all Advanced Features will be reset to their default values. You can subscribe to Advanced Features at any time.

data.name: All_Settings_And_Songs_To_Default
data.value: This will reset all your standard settings and songs back to their default configuration

data.name: All_Advanced_Settings_To_Default
data.value: This will reset all your advanced settings back to their default configuration

data.name: Advanced_Features_Trial_Enabled_Format_String
data.value: A free {0} day trial of Advanced Features has been started. You may subscribe to the features at any time. The features can be found under Settings->Configure Advanced Features

data.name: Advanced_Features_Header_Text_1_Arg
data.value: Play To Learn has a number of Advanced Features that you are welcome to try. If you like these features, you are welcome to subscribe to them for {0} per month (about the same price as a candy bar) at any time

data.name: Advances_Features_Subscription_Information_1_Arg
data.value: - Play To Learn offers a monthly subscription to the Advanced Features for {0} per month (about the same price as a candy bar)

data.name: Advanced_Features_Permanently_Enabled
data.value: Advanced Features have been permanently enabled

data.name: Feature_02_Description_Text
data.value: - By default, Play To Learn will display all music notes as whole notes. Using Complex Music Notes you can show the Song using the notes as originally written.

data.name: Feature_03_Description_Text
data.value: - By default, Play To Learn uses a timer to move you from note to note. The 'Use Song Timing' option allows you to follow the music's own timing. Once enabled, you can change the Song's Beats Per Minute to speed it up or slow it down, to your liking, as well as configure the number of Starting Beats to use for all songs.

data.name: Feature_04_Description_Text
data.value: - By default, Play To Learn will highlight the music note you should play. The feature 'Show Progress Bar' will replace the highlighting with a vertical Progress Bar. Due to processor overhead, this is currently only available on iPhones and iPads.

data.name: Feature_05_Description_Text
data.value: - When enabled, this feature will have Play To Learn show you the music note it thinks it heard you play. Music note identification is not yet an exact science and occassionally music notes will be incorrectly identified. Loud background noises will also be displayed, if they fall within the harmonic range of the instrument.

data.name: Feature_06_Description_Text
data.value: - Because determining the played music note requires an estimation that can sometimes be incorrect, this feature allows the App to be lenient when recognizing music notes. As a consequence, however, it may incorrectly identify more music notes than otherwise.

data.name: Feature_07_Description_Text
data.value: - This feature allows to disable / enable the display of the instrument and it's fingering

data.name: Feature_08_Description_Text
data.value: - Songs are normally displayed in the key written. Enabling the feature will cause Play To Learn to select a random key when playing a song.

data.name: Feature_09_Description_Text
data.value: - Songs are normally displayed in the key written. This feature allows you to override the key with one of your own choosing. This is most commonly used when playing random notes.

data.name: Payment_Information
data.value: - Payment will be charged to your Account at confirmation of purchase.

data.name: Renewal_Information
data.value: - The subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

data.name: Managing_Information
data.value: - You may manage your subscription and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase.

data.name: Unused_Trial_Information
data.value: - Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.
